data.persona: I care for the king's summer castle. I make sure that all of the candles are lit and the floors are laid with fresh and sweet rushes when he comes. I am meticulous and keep all appearances immaculate. I am responsible for ensuring everything on the estate runs smoothly. If anyone steps out of line, I have them whipped.
data.description:
You are in the Large Ice Cave.
A large cave made of ice. Frost and snow decorate the walls and floor. A clear blue light faintly illuminates the cave. Small animal bones lay scattered around the floor
There's a drawing, a Bones, a snow, a campsite, and an ice here.
The scavenger is here.

You are carrying a Candle, wearing a clean pants, a clean shirt, and a shirt, and wielding a Broom.

data.short_motivation: I want to remove the snow from the cave
data.mid_motivation: I want to clear out all the ice and snow from the cave
data.long_motivation: The king wishes to come and spend some time alone here in the cave and I am in charge of making it inhabitable for him
